original_text: And it shall be in that day, that living waters shall go out from Jerusalem; half of them toward the former sea, and half of them toward the hinder sea: in summer and in winter shall it be.
korean_text: 그 날에 생수가 예루살렘에서 솟아나서 절반은 동해로, 절반은 서해로 흐를 것이라 여름에도 겨울에도 그러하리라

sentences.original_text: And it shall be in that day
that living waters shall go out
half of them toward the former sea
and half of them toward the hinder sea
in summer and in winter shall it be
